message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your offer, the value of this product is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $115, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. How about $105?
